name: Shrapnel
description: Shrapnel (ticker: SHRAP) is an inflationary token launched along with BombSwap. It was the first token available for trading on Bombswap exchange, initially through an IDO (Initial Dex Offering). Emissions are paused for Shrapnel currently, so the current token supply is fixed at 9,964.22. Shrapnel is now part of the MCLB DAO umbrella which stacks ve(3,3) governance tokens to produce a flywheel effect on ve(3,3) dexes similar to fBomb. Shrapnel will eventually be reworked as the farming token for Bombswap v2.
